page.title: 09HEALTH CARE IN ARBROATH.
page.content: In recent years many local people have campaigned to keep the Infirmary open. Mr.Kerr,the administrator,told us that two wards are now in use.He said the Infirmary was important to the local{ {community}because it helped the{ {population}to see relatives without having to travel.It also provivides{ {employment}for a few people in the town.The Infirmary deals with people who have heart attacks,chest complaints,who need examinations.There is also a maternity unit.In the future Mr.Kerr said the Infirmary hoped to expand the surgical services.People needing majmor surgery would need to start up a psychiatric ward Mr.Kerr said that they worked very closely with Arbroath Health Care to ensure good{health}care.
